title: #305: The Battle Between Good and Evil with John Paul Rice
description:
Thank you so much for tuning for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back TFH favorite John Paul Rice to discuss his thoughts on if there is a silent war going between good and evil for the future of this country. As always the Care Bear of Conspiracies bring some much need positive energy in these dark times! Thank you for your support.

Please check out all of John's internet:
His website: Norestrictionsent.com
Twitter: @norestrictions
